title: Low Priority Queue for leaving a game I couldn't connect to
body:
I joined a normal game and went through champ select normally  without any issues, but when I get to the loading screen it gives me a message saying "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again" 
I tried disconnecting and reconnecting, logging in and out but nothing worked 
eventually the game ended with a loss and I got placed in a low priority que 

Anyone knows how to fix this issue ? 
this is like the 3rd time this has happened and it's really frustrating..

replies.body:
I queued up for two games and had this happen to me in both games. Same drill as always, everything working fine before the patch - the patch hits and bam, game unplayable! I was one of the people who also experienced the higher ping and random disconnects etc etc during the patch 6.17 and now I cannot connect to games after this patch.
Lost a placement ranked game because of it and a normal game was remade, leaver marked for both.

I give up.

It sounds like your network is having trouble specifically connecting to the game server.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and settings to fix this up.  You can test this out in custom games to prevent further lower priority queues.  Let me know if you have any questions!
